Description: Completing this degree I gained knowledge in pertaining to rock and mineral identification, structural geology, volcanology, sedimentology, aerial map interpretation, GIS, ect.

This degree has given me the foundation for software development. As a graduate I worked mainly with C++, PHP, JavaScript, SQL databases, CSS3, and HTML5. In addition learned about software life cycles, software methodology, OOP, data structures, computer networks, and web orientated programming.

Taking this program advanced my understanding of OOP concepts and troubleshooting skills and Agile Software to design a variety of desktop and web applications. I develop knowledge and skills in the areas of C#, web programming, ASP.NET and ASP.NET MVC, and database connectivity.
